subject: Skiing
X Games
Alpine Skiing
World Cup (Skiing)
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Ski racing has taken the ageless thirst for speed and enduring dance with danger and added tricked-up ramps, supersize jumps and scary turns in a made-for-TV format.
snippet: Ski racing has taken the ageless thirst for speed and enduring dance with danger and added tricked-up ramps, supersize jumps and scary turns in a made-for-TV format.
